short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store checkout events in browser storage when network is unavailable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline Circulation Extension for use with Bibliovation Integrated Library System.  Stores checkout data in browser when network is unavailable.  Stored events can be replayed within the ILS circulation module when network access is restored.
